tech_colossus.zhcn_desc: 巨构工程学的进步模糊了梦想和现实的界限，让我们能够建造巨像级战舰——携带了只需按下一个按钮就能彻底抹去一个星球，或是彻底改变这个星球的可怕武器。
tech_colossus.en_desc: Advances in mega-engineering make blur the lines between reality and the fantastical, enabling the construction of Colossus-class military vessels that carry weapons capable of obliterating - or fundamentally altering - entire worlds, with the push of a button.

tech_pk_cracker.zhcn_desc: 发射的热能流能够加热行星大气，并引爆行星核心，此举将彻底的毁灭星球的地壳构造。 最后，一个相对较小的冲击波会将行星炸得四分五裂。
tech_pk_cracker.en_desc: A directed feed of thermic energy superheats the atmosphere and agitates the planet's core, setting up disastrous tectonic events. A final and comparatively minute concussive blast is then delivered, cracking the planet open.

tech_gargantuan_evolution.zhcn_desc: 湮灭恶兽蛋进化出了通过吸收邻近恒星的能源来忍受严酷太空环境的能力。
tech_gargantuan_evolution.en_desc: Voidspawn eggs have evolved to withstand the harsh conditions of space by absorbing and conserving energy from their nearest star.
tech_gargantuan_evolution.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+5%§!

tech_lgate_activation.zhcn_desc: L星门超出了我们对亚空间原理的理解。在将其开启之前，我们必须对此进行补救。
tech_lgate_activation.en_desc: The L-Gates defy our current understanding of subspace mechanics. This must be remedied before they can be opened for travel.

tech_repeatable_lcluster_clue.zhcn_desc: 对纳米机器与亚空间现象进行大量研究，最终将为瘫痪的L星门谜团揭开新的§YL星门认知§!。
tech_repeatable_lcluster_clue.en_desc: Intensive study within the fields of nanomachinery and subspace phenomena will eventually yield a new §YL-Gate Insight§! into the Disabled L-Gate mystery.

tech_experimental_subspace_navigation.en_desc: Solitary Science Ships can break out of the naturally-occurring hyperlanes and attempt to navigate to known but otherwise unreachable destinations.

tech_neuroregeneration.zhcn_desc: 当适应了一个物种的基因组之后，这种经工程设计出来的组织能够表现出强烈的神经再生特性，显著加速了其受体中神经元、轴突和突触的发育。
tech_neuroregeneration.en_desc: When tailored to a species' genome, this form of tissue engineering has intensive neuroregenerative properties, significantly increasing the development of neurons, axons, and synapses in its recipient.
tech_neuroregeneration.zhcn_modifier: 领袖经验获得：§G+25%§!\n领袖等级上限：§G+1§!

tech_nanite_repair_system.zhcn_desc: 在拾荒者机器人的残骸里发现了一种高效的船壳自动维修系统，由数十亿个微型纳米机器人组成，并已改造成可为我们所用。至于拾荒者是从远古残骸中夺取了这个系统，还是原本就自带该系统则不得而知。
tech_nanite_repair_system.en_desc: A highly effective hull auto-repair system comprised of billions of microscopic nanomachines was found among the smoking remains of the Scavenger, and has been repurposed for our uses. Whether the Scavenger pilfered this system from an ancient derelict, or was originally constructed with it remains unknown.

tech_solar_panel_network.zhcn_desc: 先进的太阳能板科技可以抵消恒星基地的运行成本。不过，这些太阳能板需要占用一个恒星基地的模块才能生产足够规模的能源。
tech_solar_panel_network.en_desc: Advances in solar panel technology could offset the operating costs of our starbases. The panels would require an entire starbase module to generate enough energy, however.

tech_space_exploration.zhcn_desc: 超光速航行的实现带来了太空时代的曙光。跨星系载人航行现在不再仅仅是可能，而是变成一种必要的技术。
tech_space_exploration.en_desc: The realization of faster-than-light travel is a new dawn for space exploration. Manned missions to other star systems are now not only possible, but necessary.

tech_corvettes.zhcn_desc: 超光速航行技术的突破将使得我们将传统的地空军用太空梭最终改造成体型相对小，速度快，操纵性强但是火力有限的机动战舰。
tech_corvettes.en_desc: The FTL breakthrough allowed early attempts to adapt traditional surface-to-space shuttle frames to military applications to finally create relatively small, fast, and maneuverable vessels with limited firepower.

tech_destroyers.zhcn_desc: 尽管比护卫舰大一些，但是驱逐舰的船体结构仍使它仍不失为一种较为灵活的炮艇。
tech_destroyers.en_desc: While larger than Corvettes, Destroyer hull configurations still make for comparatively nimble gunboats.
tech_destroyers.zhcn_modifier: 舰队指挥上限：§G+10§!\n§H解锁舰船类型：§!驱逐舰

tech_cruisers.zhcn_desc: 这种船体结构最初设计为下一代试验型殖民船，其丰富的挂载点使得其能够理想地携带重武器及弹药。
tech_cruisers.en_desc: Originally devised as an experimental next-generation colony ship hull configuration, the design's ample hardpoints made it ideal for carrying heavy weapons ordnance.

tech_starbase_1.zhcn_desc: 为了充分利用恒星系中的资源，我们必须在星系主星较近的轨道附近建立一个集中化的太空设施。
tech_starbase_1.en_desc: A centralized space installation built in close orbit around the system primary is necessary to make full use of the resources in a star system.

tech_starbase_2.zhcn_desc: 初期的恒星基地只不过是临时的前哨站。而永久性的星港能够让我们保证对恒星系的牢固控制。
tech_starbase_2.en_desc: The earliest starbases were little more than makeshift outposts. Permanent starports will enable us to maintain a firmer grip on star systems.

tech_starbase_3.zhcn_desc: 随着太空交通流量的增加，我们需要更大更可靠的恒星基地来保证对恒星系航道的控制。
tech_starbase_3.en_desc: As space traffic increases, larger and more defensible starbases are needed to maintain control over system spacelanes.

tech_dark_matter_propulsion.zhcn_desc: 这些舰船推进器利用暗物质技术，以一种似乎违反了多个物理法则的方式来产生推进力。
tech_dark_matter_propulsion.en_desc: These ship thrusters utilize Dark Matter technology to generate propulsion in a manner that appears to defy numerous laws of physics.

tech_akx_worm_1.zhcn_desc: 宇宙似乎不可避免的在向前进。这一趋势无法逆转……但只要付出的代价足够，现在这一切都可以颠覆。
tech_akx_worm_1.en_desc: The universe tends irresistibly onwards and downwards. That tendency cannot be reversed... but it can be subverted, for a price.

▲始终可用

tech_akx_worm_2.zhcn_desc: 这是一整套基于自相矛盾的直觉，还有爱，之上的社会准则。当我们通晓圆环之理后，我们了解到，无论是发出指令抑或是接受指令，我们都可以对其产生影响。
tech_akx_worm_2.en_desc: A set of social protocols based on paradoxical intuition, and on love. When we know the System of the Loop, we learn that we can influence by receiving instructions, as well as giving them.
tech_akx_worm_2.weight_modifier_logic:
▲修正：
№如果满足下列条件，则系数 × 0
▲始终可用

tech_akx_worm_3.zhcn_desc: 当时间悖论开始相互纠缠之时，一个难以形容的意识在黑暗深处渐渐苏醒，它渴望着，索求着。之前发生的一切就是这个意识——某些人口中所称的“时之螶”所引起的。如果我们能够让自己同这个意识进行同调的话，我们或许可以触摸到永生的大门。
tech_akx_worm_3.en_desc: When a temporal paradox becomes tangled, a kind of consciousness arises, with its own needs, its own desires. This is what has occurred with the consciousness that some call the Worm-in-Waiting. If we can align ourselves with that consciousness, we might just achieve a kind of immortality.

tech_dragon_armor.zhcn_desc: 以太龙麟由多层独特矿物质纳米结构构成，具自我修复能力。采用非常规制造手段能够让我们精确仿制出这些能够自我修复的结构。
tech_dragon_armor.en_desc: The Ether Drake's scales are made up of multiple layers of unique mineral nanostructures. Unorthodox manufacturing techniques allow us to closely emulate these self-repairing structures.

tech_enigmatic_encoder.zhcn_desc: 神秘编码器在将战斗路径数据返回舰队指挥中心前，会根据某种未知的法则对数据进行加密。
tech_enigmatic_encoder.en_desc: The Enigmatic Encoder scrambles flight path data according to some indeterminable design before feeding it back to fleet command.

tech_enigmatic_decoder.zhcn_desc: 虽然神秘解码器在标准测试中表现平平，但目标的战斗路径越不规则，该编码器预测算法的准确度似乎就越高。
tech_enigmatic_decoder.en_desc: While producing average results in standard tests, the accuracy of Enigmatic Decoder's prediction algorithms seemingly increases as the target's flight path grows more erratic.

tech_orbital_trash_dispersal.zhcn_desc: 这种轨道轰炸管理系统将会向目标星球同时发射上百万高速小型投射物，籍此试图用垃圾信息过载该星球的防卫系统。装有该装置的船只在进行轨道轰炸时，将会造成更多伤害。
tech_orbital_trash_dispersal.en_desc: This orbital bombardment management system spams a planet with millions of minute, high-velocity projectiles, overwhelming planetside defensive grids with trash data. Ships equipped with this component will cause more damage during orbital bombardment.

tech_xeno_tourism_agency.zhcn_desc: 该企业中介提供各种星际旅游的宣传服务，同时也为希望搬至企业空间的移民者提供就业福利与签约奖励。
tech_xeno_tourism_agency.en_desc: This corporate agency promotes a wide variety of interstellar tourist attractions, as well as offering employment packages and signing bonuses to potential emigrants interested in relocating to corporate space.

tech_executive_retreat.en_desc: A luxurious resort complex for high ranking corporate officers. Here they can sample the local planetary culture in a high security environment.

tech_hyper_drive_2.zhcn_desc: 我们已经确定太空中有能使飞船消耗更少的能源“突破”并进入一个超空间航道的点的存在。这将产生新一代的超级引擎。

null_void_beam.zhcn_desc: 利用太虚的熵特性，这种光束可以真正地摧毁能量。
null_void_beam.en_desc: By harnessing the entropic nature of the Null Void, this beam can actually destroy energy.

tech_planetary_defenses.zhcn_desc: 宇宙浩瀚冰冷，觊觎谋划者狡诈无情，保护我们的家园，时刻准备着。
tech_planetary_defenses.en_desc: There may come a time when intellects, vast and cool and unsympathetic, regard our worlds with envy and draw plans against us. We must be ready.

tech_interplanetary_commerce.zhcn_desc: 在建立行星贸易所后，商机也变得更为丰富。业务将飞速拓张。
tech_interplanetary_commerce.en_desc: With new planetary markets comes new opportunities for commerce. Business will be booming.

tech_space_trading.zhcn_desc: 跨星际的贸易需要我们克服新的一系列的挑战。以及时且最具成本效益的方式将货物从一个星系运输到另一个星系是至关重要的。
tech_space_trading.en_desc: Trade across interstellar distances presents a new set of challenges to overcome. It is critical to achieve the transfer of goods from one system to another in a timely and above all cost efficient manner.

tech_ascension_theory.zhcn_desc: 我们的历史就是一个不断螺旋上升的过程。每次循环中，我们的科技、政治和文化水平都会出现飞跃式的发展。这些飞跃通常都出现在动乱之后，随后又带来相对平稳的时代。通过甄别这样的核心前提，我们也许能够大大缩短循环的时间，这样有利于缩短我们的发展周期。
tech_ascension_theory.en_desc: Our history is a repeating cycle of dramatic technological, political, and cultural leaps; these leaps are often preceded by periods of upheaval and followed by times of relative stability. By identifying the core, recurring premises of these leaps, we may be able to effectively short-circuit the cycle for our own benefit.

tech_adaptive_combat_algorithms.zhcn_desc: 有机生命体经常采用不合逻辑且不可预测的战术，这对我们来说很难有效应对。但采用自适应的战术以及新的、机动性更好的战体将能提供决定性的优势。
tech_adaptive_combat_algorithms.en_desc: Organics often fight using illogical and unpredictable tactics that can be difficult to effectively counter. Adaptive tactics and new, more maneuverable warforms should provide a decisive advantage.
